r.d: Internationalization extension implements ICU library functionality in PHP.
r.n: - Add UConverter class (ICU's UConverter API). See RFC at http://wiki.php.net/rfc/uconverter - Fixed defective cloning of subclassed intl classes. See also bug #62915. - Allow Spoofchecker to be registered on ICU versions with .1 minor numbers like ICU 49.1. - Fix SPOOFCHECKER_METHOD_FETCH_OBJECT definition. - Fix handling of several uinitialized intl objects. - Added the intl tests extracted from Symfony. - Fixed several tests.
